title: How to Download Older Patches! (Take that Riot!)
body:
Hey! I've been digging through forums to find out how to download older patches (I was looking for Patch 4.20) - I found this.

http://leaguesandbox.com/forum/thread-276.html
It shows you how to do it. In the comments you will find a guy called 'Chaos' who created a full patch downloader for 4.20. Just change the versions to your specified version in the List.txt (guide in the forum), to find your version, go to your  version list:

PBE: http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/releases/pbe/projects/lol_game_client/releases/releaselisting

Live: http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/releases/live/projects/lol_game_client/releases/releaselisting

NA (for NA only updates): http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/releases/live/projects/lol_game_client/releases/releaselisting_NA


Remember to check that forum thread for more info! (and a better guide!)

replies.body:
But wouldn't this mean you can't play games with anyone who's not on the same patch as you?

Also, why the "take that!"? It's not like Riot are purposefully going out of their way to prevent people playing on different patches; it just literally makes no sense to allow them.

Modifications to the game may trigger the exploit detection and get your account banned.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=mdRAR3HO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-22T08:03:43.404+0000)
>
> But wouldn't this mean you can't play games with anyone who's not on the same patch as you?
> 
> Also, why the "take that!"? It's not like Riot are purposefully going out of their way to prevent people playing on different patches; it just literally makes no sense to allow them.
> 
> Modifications to the game may trigger the exploit detection and get your account banned.

Well you have to play on 'custom servers' using server emulators of the desired patch. "Take that" is because riot says that you cant download older patches. And yes mods for the game can get you banned, but not all that often.

Support Ticket regarding previous patch downloads:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/17470260
